transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji kaun?
Executive: Aditya ji baat kar rahe hain na Gajanan Herbal se Herbal se?
Customer: Ji mam bataiye.
Executive: Sir India Mart se baat kar rahi hu main senior manager kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Haan ji mam bataiye thoda.
Executive: Haan ji sir aapka ek conflict chal raha tha kisi supplier ke sath India Mart ke to uske liye I think aapse jo hamari buyer supplier conflict team hai wo bhi connect kar rahi hai Rahul waha se connect kar rahe hain na concern ke liye.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji to kya hua sir ye jo aapka problem tha wo solve hua abhi?
Customer: Mam abhi tak nahi hua mam.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Sir theek hai to aap na haan bataiye kya bol rahe ho?
Customer: Na to abhi tak mere paas payment hai wapis aaya na to material wapis hai mere paas.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm payment bhi gaya aapne payment bheja tha unko ya fir kharida tha unse?
Customer: Nahi mam kharida tha mam maine.
Executive: Aapne kharida tha unse.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm sir aap kharidne se pehle ek bar hume connect kar lete to hum kisi aapko authenticate supplier ki details de dete kya hota hai na aapne hamare non paid supplier se detail product kharide hain wo hamare paid supplier nahi hai aur jo hamari hamari jo buyer supplier conflict team hai unhone hame bataya hai ki jis supplier se aapne jo product kharide hain unhone aapko document bhi fraud diye hue hain jo aapne kuch details share kari thi na.
Customer: Ji mam mam aisa rehta hai ki jaise main bhi main bhi paid thoda customer hu aapke liye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur jab main ye check kar main mujhe aapka mujhe samne wali party ka number tabhi aata hai jab main use main paid hu.
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai sir aap hamesha agar kuch kharide to pehle humse baat kar le ki aap uske sath sath hum aapko details provide kara de hamare paid supplier ki aapne kya kiya aapne pricing ko lekar ke thoda scroll down karte gaye honge aur aap aur aapne sabse niche se ja kar ke suppliers ki details nikal ke waha se jo product hai wo kharid liya.
Customer: Mam ab is bare mein to itna jankari nahi mam maine to usne ye kaha india mart se ke through mile hai to fir mera aadha matlab main waise hi book kar gaya tha ki matlab india mart ek trusted wo hai ki ispe koi aisa kam nahi hoga dhokhadhadi ko leke.
Executive: Sir bilkul bilkul hai sir but India Mart mein bhi hamare kuch paid suppliers hai aur kuch hamare unpaid suppliers hai to hum to sir guarantee unki ji aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji mam haan ji sir haan sir to main ye keh rahi hu aap kuch keh rahe ho sir?
Customer: Mam koi urgent call aa raha tha thoda pitaji ka is vajah se hold kar diye.
Executive: Koi problem nahi hai sir koi issue nahi hai to main yahi keh rahi thi sir ki dekho iske liye to legal team ka aapke paas number hai hi Rahul ka number aa gaya hoga aapke paas agar kuch kar bhi payenge sir wahi kar payenge kyuki wahi aage in sab chizo ko dekhte hain in sab is cases ko dekhte hain hai na aapka concern open hai sir hamara servicing team mein to servicing team se mujhe aapka concern close karna hoga maine already concern aapka hamare internal department mein jo Rahul ka department hai waha share kara hua hai mail ke through theek hai to aap please sir unhi se connect mein rahiyega is concern ko lekar ke to mujhe aapka ye wala concern close karna padega sir mam dala rehne dijiye mam kya hai mam wo ho jayega to apne aap nahi sir abhi kyuki kyuki concern sir hamare liye nahi hai na dekho aap samjho sir concern agar hamare department ko lekar ke hota to koi baat nahi aapka concern rehne do hame koi problem nahi hai but agar wo mere department ke related nahi hai sir wo wrong department mein dala hua hai isko maine correct department mein forward kar diya hai to mujhe servicing team ka to band karna padega na sir concern.
Customer: Hello mam abhi isse thoda mam pitaji se baat kara lo mam iske liye thoda.
Executive: Kisse baat kara du?
Customer: Pitaji se main apne pitaji se baat kara lo aap please thoda unse aap Rahul ki baat kara dijiye sir Rahul hi ye pura department take care karta hai.
Customer: Unse ek bar baat karne ke baad fir main aapko batata hu.
Executive: Haan aap Rahul se baat kara dijiye sir ye sab theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive payment/material.

- Customer claims to have been defrauded.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about paid and unpaid suppliers.

- Executive shared Rahul's contact for legal assistance.

- Executive will close the concern from servicing team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect with Rahul.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, payment, suppliers, legal team
